reference: Andrews, D.F., Bickel, P.J. , Hampel, F.R., Huber, P.J., Rogers, W.H. and Tukey, J.W. [1972] Robust Estimates of Location, Princeton University Press, Princeton, N.J.
Andrews, D.F. [1973] "Some Monte Carlo Results on Robust/Resistant Regression." (unpublished).
Hample, F.R. [1973] "Robust Estimation: a condensed partial survey" Z. Wahrscheinlichkeitstheorie very. Geb. 27, 87-104.
Holland, P.W. [1973] "Monte Carlo for robust regression: the swindle unmasked." NBER Working Paper No. 10.
Huber, P.J. [1973] "Robust regression: Asymptotics, conjectures and Monte Carlo" Annals of Statistics 1, 799-821.
Kendall, M.G. and Stuart, A. [1963] The Advanced Theory of Statistics Vol. I 20d edition. Hafner, New York.
Tukey, J.W. [1973] "Away forward for robust regression" (unpublished).
